EmailTemplate.name: Contract Agreement Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Contract Agreement has been Approved {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The following Contract Agreement has been approved: {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.Name} - {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.APXT_Redlining__Account__c}.
You can navigate to the Contract Agreement by clicking on {!APXT_Redlining__Contract_Agreement__c.Link}.
Thank you!
